hunt.name: Historic Atlanta
hunt.desc: Hunt for Historical sites in Atlanta, GA

clues.name: Swan House
clues.desc: Designed by famed Atlanta architect Philip Trammell Shutze
clues.fact: In 2004, the Atlanta History Center completed a $5.4 million restoration of the house and its furnishings

clues.name: The Varsity
clues.desc: A restaurant chain, iconic in the modern culture of Atlanta, Georgia
clues.fact: Downtown Atlanta location is on more than two acres and can accommodate 600 cars and over 800 people inside

clues.name: Ferris Wheel
clues.desc: One-of-a-kind, thrilling look at Atlanta from atop a 200-foot story
clues.fact: Those looking for an even more enhanced experience can enjoy VIP gondola boasting Ferrari leather seats, glass floor and a longer flight time

hunt.name: Historic Norcross
hunt.desc: Hunt for Historical sites in Norcross, GA

clues.name: Gwinnett Mall
clues.desc: This mall was seriously challenged by the opening of Mall of Georgia in 1999 and Sugarloaf Mills (formerly Discover Mills) in 2001
clues.fact: What used to be Belk department store, is turning into a Fantasy World

clues.name: Historic Downtown Norcross
clues.desc: Downtown to Only Historic District in Gwinnett County Listed in the United States Department of the Interior National Registry of Historic Landmarks
clues.fact: Gwinnett County’s second oldest city, Norcross saw new roads and highways which were later built by-pass the city, preserving its historic center as a 19th-century railroad town

clues.name: MicroCenter
clues.desc: Is a destination retailer designed to satisfy the dedicated computer user
clues.fact: MicroCenter is the retail company in the Micro Electronics family that also includes WinBook Corporation, Redemtech, and PowerSpec

clues.name: Gwinnett Mall

clues.fact: Gwinnett County’s second oldest city, Norcross saw new roads and highways which were later built by-pass the city, preserving its historic center as a 19th-century railroad town

clues.name: MicroCenter
clues.desc: Is a destination retailer designed to satisfy the dedicated computer user
clues.fact: MicroCenter is the retail company in the Micro Electronics family that also includes WinBook Corporation, Redemtech, and PowerSpec

clues.name: UGA Gwinnett Campus
clues.desc: The last official class building for UGA MIT students, before the program goes online
clues.fact: The 2014 MIT Cohort is awesome!

hunt.name: Historic Roswell
hunt.desc: Hunt for Historical sites in Roswell, GA

clues.name: Old Mill Park
clues.desc: This bridge and waterfall are favorite spots for amateur and professional photographers, that was burned in 1864 and 1926 and re-built
clues.fact: The waterfall created when the creek was dammed to provide waterpower as well as the original machine shop can be viewed from the interpreted trail

clues.name: Smith Plantation Home
clues.desc: This home and grounds have become one of the best examples of architectural, cultural, and historical interpretation found in the Southern region
clues.fact: Three generations of the Archibald Smith family lived in this home and saved all of their belongings, large and small, important and trivial, broken or whole.

clues.name: Mansell House & Gardens
clues.desc: A 1910 Victorian home, filled with period antiques and surrounded by gardens
clues.fact: The Mansell House and Gardens is a beautiful venue for wedding ceremonies, receptions, rehearsal dinners, bar/bat mitzvahs, showers, birthday parties, holiday parties, meetings and more
